name: Present Runner
description:
Armed with nothing but a map and a 15 foot vertical, you must run, jump, and wallrun your way across the city to deliver presents and save Christmas. Can you do it in time? If so, how fast?

A relatively simple, gameboy-styled platformer made for the Extra Credits Holiday Jam, made with a focus on game feel above all. Poofs of smoke, camera movement, coyote time/edge gravity, the like. It also has a custom 8-bit rendition of Carol of the Bells, if you're into that sort of thing.

Art based on Lanea Zimmerman's "Minimalist Sidescroll City"

Sound Effects from @Shader's "8-Bit Sound Effect Pack (Vol. 001)"

UPDATE: v1.1:

  • Prevent players from falling through the floor
  • Make several jumps less annoying to land overall
  • Add an additional present and location to deliver to
  • Removed present carrying limit

Controls:

[A/D] or [Left/Right] - move

[W] or [Up] or [Space] - jump, hold to wallrun

[S] or [Down] - fall through floors

[Esc] - quit

[R] - restart

[Z] - toggle between a few window sizes (in windowed mode)

You can use Alt+Enter to go fullscreen, but I've seen people have problems with lag in full-screen Gamemaker games on Win10, so make sure the timer is counting at a second per second.
